title: How to Create Your Send‐to‐Kindle Email Address

steps.title: Register your Kindle device or Kindle reading app with Amazon.
steps.content: Register your Kindle device or Kindle reading app with Amazon. Open the device and register through its settings (after pressing the Menu button). This sign-in/register link is on the first page of the settings of your Kindle), So your items can be downloaded and you can send files to it.

steps.title: Visit and sign into the Amazon- Manage Your Kindle Settings webpage in your web browser, to manage your settings.
steps.content: Visit and sign into the Amazon- Manage Your Kindle Settings webpage in your web browser, to manage your settings.

steps.title: Click "Your Digital Items" at the top of any Amazon website's screen.
steps.content: Click "Your Digital Items" at the top of any Amazon website's screen.

steps.title: Click the "Manage Your Devices" tab from the left of the site.
steps.content: Click the "Manage Your Devices" tab from the left of the site. Click the link titled "Personal Documents Setting". You'll find the link underneath your account name, as well as your registered address, serial number of the device, and your Kindle's name.

steps.title: Click the "Edit" link next to the Kindle you'd like to change or add the address to.
steps.content: Click the "Edit" link next to the Kindle you'd like to change or add the address to.

steps.title: Type a new address.
steps.content: Type a new address. Be sure that name portion is filled out. The "@Kindle.com" portion is already encoded into the system, to be used for every Kindle Deliver-to email.
